channel.title: How to make pop up/email avatars
channel.description:
First you need : Hosting, supporting php, htaccess and ftp. Ftp Client Notepad
Open up notepad, copy/paste in the following code : [code] ErrorDocument 404 mailto:youhavebeenowned ForceType application/x-httpd-php[/code]
Save as htaccess.txt
Make a new directory in ftp on your hosting, upload the .htaccess.txt and rename to just .htaccess (Not with a .txt) Your brand new pop up avatar will be at http://www.yoursitehosting.com/newdirectory/footbar.jpg Put this as your avatar, or include it in any posts you make and it will force open either thunderbird, outlook express or whatever email client you use.
